review: It was beautiful experience and wonderful stay in Sun and Sand Camp.The tents was clean and nicely maintained.Very spacious and beautiful room, service was excellent and the food quality was great. Thank you Mr Nassar and his staff for lifelong memories.I would suggest this is most preferred camp at Nubra valley.  Highly recommended place .
